post:
Hello guys, 

My name is Hassan and I'm here from ReverseHosts.com to offer you a special discount on our 512MB and 1GB RAM plans. These will be hosted with QuickPacket in Atlanta, GA, and with Calihop in San Diego, CA. We have been around since September of 2012 and are always working on improving our services. These VPSs use OpenVZ and SolusVM.

Test IPs:

Atlanta, GA: 199.233.235.235

San Diago, CA: 67.207.208.210

- 60GB DiskSpace

- 512MB RAM

- 1024MB Burst

- 1 IPv4 Address

- 100Mbps Port

- OpenVZ/SolusVM

Order Now:

$2.99/mo - Atlanta, GA

Order Now:

We are currently having issues with Paypals IPN that we are still trying to get solved, so your VPS may take up to 2 hours to get setup, however usually they are set up in the first 10 minutes.
